description: As a User I want to validate the reservation page preview widget for draft orders
name: Admin regression page load

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional :Verify that on the Reservations table when a row is clicked the Order Preview widget appears and has the correct contents

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
I have created an order as a customer

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 60000ms: Expected to find content: 'Via Card (SagePay)' within the element: <p.chakra-text.css-0> but never did.
    at fillGeneralInformationForm (src/integration/functions/rs2.js:332:5)
    at Object.internalCheckOut (src/integration/functions/rs2.js:394:2)
    at _callee$ (src/integration/steps/Reservation2/Draftorderpayments/Draftorderpayments.js:15:8)
    at tryCatch (node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/regeneratorRuntime.js:45:0)
    at Generator.eval (node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/regeneratorRuntime.js:133:0)
    at Generator.eval [as next] (node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/regeneratorRuntime.js:74:0)
    at asyncGeneratorStep (node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/asyncToGenerator.js:3:0)
    at _next (node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/asyncToGenerator.js:22:0)

steps.name: I am on the reservations page
I should be on the base url
I click on the a row in the table for a draft order
I should see the Order Preview widget
The Order Preview widget should contain "Customer Details:" "Booking Details:" "Ticket Details:" and "Total:" section
The Order Preview widget should have a "View Order Details" button with background colors "rgb(125, 227, 203)"
